name: JPN Burst (itch)
description:
Learn some Japanese!

JPN Burst is an educational game that teaches Japanese through typing out flashcards.

Features
  • Learn Hiragana
  • Learn Katakana
  • Study Mode/Timed Mode
  • 4 Tests
  • 4 minigames
  • Many save slots
Please note

JPN Burst is currently not a finished game and may or may not change significantly over the course of development.

It is available on Steam.

The Itch version does NOT come with a Steam key.
